item.description:
The Hide Away
@ Anthony's
105 Canal St
Malden, MA 02148

Our 1st BLUSH MUZIQ FEMME FEST. Come rain or shine we will have a great summer day outside, if it rains we will have the concert indoors. Our line up consist of a very diverse group of live music which you will all enjoy.

Doors open at 12:00 pm and the 1st band will go on from 1:00 pm to 6:00 pm. The dancing will continue outside (weather permitting) till 1:30 am with a DJ. So make sure you get there early.

* The New Possibilities (Current alternative rock/pop songs & 70's & 80's)
* Sister Funk (pop/rock, similar in sound & style to artists like Pink & Maroon Five)
* Lourdes Pita (Folk/Pop/Rock & Latin)
* Lauren Bateman (Boston Pop/Rock )
* Midnight Square (Jazz)
* Verzatil (Latin)

In addition we will also have a MECHANICAL BULL for all those who are daring to get
thrown, a DUNK TANK for for those who want to get WET and GO GO DANCERS for those
who like to look.

TICKETS: $20.00 in advance and $25.00 at the door. Price includes a barbecue lunch.

VIP PACKAGE $55.00: Includes Suzanne Westenhoefer, Blush Muziq Femme Fest and Brunch/T-dance

PURCHASE TICKETS AT: http://www.blushbosto...

Box office: (617) 877-1808

**percentage of the proceeds will go to Autism for Children**
item.name: BLUSH MUZIQ FEMME FEST Sat 06-26-10
